Producer: Jean-Pierre Dardenne, Luc Dardenne, Denis Freyd
Production Co: Radio Télévision Belge Francofone (RTB), Eyeworks, Les Films du Fleuve, BIM Distribuzione, Belgacom, Archipel 35, France 2 Cinéma
Synopsis: A factory worker (Marion Cotillard) has just one weekend to convince her colleagues to give up their bonuses so that she can keep her job.
Title: Two Days One Night
